footer.description: Pearl Clean provides premium laundry services exclusively for women, ensuring trust, quality, and convenience with every order.
footer.tagline: Premium care for the modern woman

home.description: Experience the finest laundry care designed exclusively for women. From delicate fabrics to everyday essentials, we handle your garments with the utmost care and attention.
home.feature1Desc: Dedicated exclusively to women for comfort and trust
home.feature2Desc: Convenient scheduling that fits your busy lifestyle
home.feature3Desc: Professional handling of all fabric types and garments
home.feature4Desc: Real-time updates on your order's progress
home.featuredServicesDesc: Discover our most popular laundry services designed for the modern woman
home.ctaTitle: Ready to Experience Premium Laundry Care?
home.ctaDescription: Join thousands of satisfied women who trust Pearl Clean with their precious garments. Schedule your first pickup today.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: Choose from our comprehensive range of professional laundry services, each designed to meet your specific needs with the highest quality standards.
services.loadError: Failed to load services. Please try again.
services.readyToBookDesc: Select multiple services and schedule your pickup in just a few clicks.

booking.title: Book Your Service
booking.description: Schedule your laundry pickup and let us take care of your garments with professional expertise.
booking.phoneInvalid: Please enter a valid phone number
booking.serviceRequired: Please select at least one service
booking.successMessage: Booking confirmed! Your order has been scheduled.
booking.errorMessage: Failed to create booking. Please try again.
booking.confirmationMessage: Your laundry pickup has been successfully scheduled. We'll take excellent care of your garments.
booking.confirmationNote: You will receive a confirmation call before pickup. Thank you for choosing Pearl Clean!

tracking.title: Track Your Order
tracking.description: Enter your order details below to track the progress of your laundry service in real-time.
tracking.invalidOrderId: Please enter a valid order ID (numbers only)
tracking.orderNotFound: Order not found. Please check the order ID and try again.
tracking.readyToTrackDesc: Enter your order ID above to see real-time progress updates.

orders.title: My Orders
orders.description: View and manage all your laundry orders in one convenient place.

orders.noOrdersYetDesc: You haven't placed any orders yet. Start by booking your first laundry service!
orders.noOrdersFoundDesc: No orders match your current filter. Try selecting a different status.
